name: Irish Potato and Chive Casserole
author: BAWHITE1
summary: A new twist for mashed potatoes. I usually add a dash of onion and garlic powder. I also do a taste test prior to baking to see if they need more salt. Potatoes are combined with cream cheese, sour cream, chives, butter, and paprika...Delicious!!
ingredients: 1 pinch paprika, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place potatoes in a large pot of water
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes
Combine hot potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, butter, and salt together in a large bowl
Spoon potato mixture into a 2-quart casserole dish
Bake in preheated oven until bubbling, about 30 minutes
